name: Die Mutter
description:
They woke up to find themself in a mysterious chamber.
It was not familiar to them, but they naturally knew what it is.

And then, they started to wander to play their role.

* Playtime

Around 1 hour or more(2 Endings)

* Features
  • A short classic RPG
  • Oldschool graphics
  • Collecting/Making Items and Monsters of yours
  • Able to play this immediately on your browser regardless of any device
* Controls

For keyboard

Z/Enter/SpaceAction key X/ESCCancel
Open the menu screen Arrow keysMove the player/a command ShiftDash

For smartphone

TapAction
Move the player/a command
Check a event in the place two-finger tapCancel
